short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In Gitlab - for any merge request, it switches out the Code Owners from the file pattern match to the actual owners.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When viewing the approvals section in Gitlab on any merge request, it only shows the files(s) / paths alongside the users for Code Owners. It doesn't actually show the groups. This plugin displays the groups instead - you can still view the original files(s)  / paths by hovering over the groups. See here for more information on CodeOwners - https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/user/project/codeowners/
